description:
With no laces to worry about, there’s nothing to slow your little adventurer down. An oversized rubber bumper prevents stubbed toes when running around the playground. And tire-inspired tread provides excellent grip when kids are revving up or braking hard.

  • Lightweight synthetic and performance mesh upper with a hook-and-loop closure for a secure fit
  • Lining has Eco anti-odour treatment
  • Streamlined interior and a contoured arch add support
  • Non-marking rubber sole with multi-directional lugs for traction
name: Keen Speed Hound Slip-on Shoes - Children to Youths
